availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: S D Delany (lawyer and farmer, union county)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer and attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah V. Delany. Father of C. W. Delany, Bettie E. Delany, S. H. Delany, James Delany, and Sally Delany. Owned three enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Attorney in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 2.
